LanguageData.CraftingSpot.label: crafting spot
LanguageData.CraftingSpot.description: A place for crafting simple items like knives or bows. Production here is slow because of the lack of tools.
LanguageData.CraftingSpot_Blueprint.label: crafting spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.CraftingSpot_Frame.label: crafting spot (building)
LanguageData.CraftingSpot_Frame.description: A place for crafting simple items like knives or bows. Production here is slow because of the lack of tools.
LanguageData.ButcherSpot.label: butcher spot
LanguageData.ButcherSpot.description: A place for butchering animals. Due to the lack of equipment, butchering here yields only 70% of the meat and leather of each creature.
LanguageData.ButcherSpot_Blueprint.label: butcher spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.ButcherSpot_Frame.label: butcher spot (building)
LanguageData.ButcherSpot_Frame.description: A place for butchering animals. Due to the lack of equipment, butchering here yields only 70% of the meat and leather of each creature.
LanguageData.TableSculpting.label: sculptor's table
LanguageData.TableSculpting.description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.
LanguageData.TableSculpting_Blueprint.label: sculptor's table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableSculpting_Blueprint_Install.label: sculptor's table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableSculpting_Frame.label: sculptor's table (building)
LanguageData.TableSculpting_Frame.description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.
LanguageData.TableButcher.label: butcher table
LanguageData.TableButcher.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.TableButcher_Blueprint.label: butcher table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableButcher_Blueprint_Install.label: butcher table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableButcher_Frame.label: butcher table (building)
LanguageData.TableButcher_Frame.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench.label: hand tailor bench
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench_Blueprint.label: hand tailor bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench_Frame.label: hand tailor bench (building)
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench_Frame.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench.label: electric tailor bench
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 50% of normal speed.
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench_Blueprint.label: electric tailor bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench_Frame.label: electric tailor bench (building)
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench_Frame.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 50% of normal speed.
LanguageData.FueledSmithy.label: fueled smithy
LanguageData.FueledSmithy.description: A wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.FueledSmithy_Blueprint.label: fueled smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.FueledSmithy_Blueprint_Install.label: fueled smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.FueledSmithy_Frame.label: fueled smithy (building)
LanguageData.FueledSmithy_Frame.description: A wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.label: electric smithy
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy_Blueprint.label: electric smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy_Blueprint_Install.label: electric smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy_Frame.label: electric smithy (building)
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy_Frame.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.TableMachining.label: machining table
LanguageData.TableMachining.description: A work station for assembling machinery like guns and ammunition, or breaking down dead mechanoids.
LanguageData.TableMachining_Blueprint.label: machining table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableMachining_Blueprint_Install.label: machining table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableMachining_Frame.label: machining table (building)
LanguageData.TableMachining_Frame.description: A work station for assembling machinery like guns and ammunition, or breaking down dead mechanoids.
LanguageData.ElectricStove.label: electric stove
LanguageData.ElectricStove.description: An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Blueprint.label: electric stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Blueprint_Install.label: electric stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Frame.label: electric stove (building)
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Frame.description: An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.FueledStove.label: fueled stove
LanguageData.FueledStove.description: A wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.FueledStove_Blueprint.label: fueled stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.FueledStove_Blueprint_Install.label: fueled stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.FueledStove_Frame.label: fueled stove (building)
LanguageData.FueledStove_Frame.description: A wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.label: stonecutter's table
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.description: A work table with saws and chisels for cutting stone chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.TableStonecutter_Blueprint.label: stonecutter's table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableStonecutter_Blueprint_Install.label: stonecutter's table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableStonecutter_Frame.label: stonecutter's table (building)
LanguageData.TableStonecutter_Frame.description: A work table with saws and chisels for cutting stone chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.Brewery.label: brewery
LanguageData.Brewery.description: A work station with all the equipment needed to mix wort for beer production. Wort must be fermented to finally become beer.
LanguageData.Brewery_Blueprint.label: brewery (blueprint)
LanguageData.Brewery_Blueprint_Install.label: brewery (blueprint)
LanguageData.Brewery_Frame.label: brewery (building)
LanguageData.Brewery_Frame.description: A work station with all the equipment needed to mix wort for beer production. Wort must be fermented to finally become beer.
LanguageData.DrugLab.label: drug lab
LanguageData.DrugLab.description: A work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs.
LanguageData.DrugLab_Blueprint.label: drug lab (blueprint)
LanguageData.DrugLab_Blueprint_Install.label: drug lab (blueprint)
LanguageData.DrugLab_Frame.label: drug lab (building)
LanguageData.DrugLab_Frame.description: A work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.label: electric smelter
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter_Blueprint.label: electric smelter (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter_Blueprint_Install.label: electric smelter (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter_Frame.label: electric smelter (building)
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter_Frame.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.BiofuelRefinery.label: biofuel refinery
LanguageData.BiofuelRefinery.description: Refines biological matter like wood or plant matter into chemfuel.
LanguageData.BiofuelRefinery_Blueprint.label: biofuel refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.BiofuelRefinery_Frame.label: biofuel refinery (building)
LanguageData.BiofuelRefinery_Frame.description: Refines biological matter like wood or plant matter into chemfuel.
LanguageData.FabricationBench.label: fabrication bench
LanguageData.FabricationBench.description: A workbench equipped with advanced tools for producing technological marvels from simpler materials.
LanguageData.FabricationBench_Blueprint.label: fabrication bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.FabricationBench_Frame.label: fabrication bench (building)
LanguageData.FabricationBench_Frame.description: A workbench equipped with advanced tools for producing technological marvels from simpler materials.
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.label: simple research bench
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.description: A simple bench with writing implements and simple measurement devices. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench_Blueprint.label: simple research bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench_Frame.label: simple research bench (building)
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench_Frame.description: A simple bench with writing implements and simple measurement devices. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.label: hi-tech research bench
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Allows more rapid research, and unlocks advanced research projects.
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench_Blueprint.label: hi-tech research bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench_Frame.label: hi-tech research bench (building)
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench_Frame.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Allows more rapid research, and unlocks advanced research projects.
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium.label: electric crematorium
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium.description: A huge stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with extremely high temperatures.
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium_Blueprint.label: electric crematorium (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium_Frame.label: electric crematorium (building)
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium_Frame.description: A huge stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with extremely high temperatures.
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.label: hydroponics basin
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.description: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: hydroponics basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: hydroponics basin (building)
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Frame.description: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel.label: fermenting barrel
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw wort into beer.
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel_Blueprint.label: fermenting barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel_Blueprint_Install.label: fermenting barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel_Frame.label: fermenting barrel (building)
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel_Frame.description: A barrel for fermenting raw wort into beer.
LanguageData.DeepDrill.label: deep drill
LanguageData.DeepDrill.description: A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources. This drill will yield stone chunks if no resources are present. Can be repositioned freely.
LanguageData.DeepDrill_Blueprint.label: deep drill (blueprint)
LanguageData.DeepDrill_Blueprint_Install.label: deep drill (blueprint)
LanguageData.DeepDrill_Frame.label: deep drill (building)
LanguageData.DeepDrill_Frame.description: A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources. This drill will yield stone chunks if no resources are present. Can be repositioned freely.
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.label: nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.description: A machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser_Blueprint.label: nutrient paste dispenser (blueprint)
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser_Frame.label: nutrient paste dispenser (building)
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser_Frame.description: A machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
LanguageData.Hopper.label: hopper
LanguageData.Hopper.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.
LanguageData.Hopper_Blueprint.label: hopper (blueprint)
LanguageData.Hopper_Frame.label: hopper (building)
LanguageData.Hopper_Frame.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.
